title: Top Dollar Paid For Ultra High Grade CardsJ
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Top Dollar Paid For Ultra High Grade CardsJ
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Dorskind


With an ever worsening economic outlook, and a possible depression
on the horizon, perhaps, it is time to turn that old cardboard into
a mint collection of Ben Franklins.

As the owner of America's Toughest Want, we are prepared to pay
above market prices for the ultra rare cards that we desire.

This year alone we have purchased 22 high grade type cards
from Board Members including several "1 of 1" examples.

Whilst only the best will do, we are more interested in the type card
than the player. We are not focused on HOFs.

All transactions are strictly confidential. Please write in confidence to 

Bruce Dorskind

bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com



Company Year Condition Requirement

T 208  1911   Grade 5 and above
T 209  1909  (color only) Grade 6 and above
T 216  1910  Grade 5 and above
T 217  1911   Grade 5 and above

Oxford 1921 Grade 6 and above
Lections 1923 Grade 5 and above
E 93 1910 Grade 7 and above
N 162 1887 Grade 7 and above
E 98 1910 Grade 7 and above
e 103 Williams 1909 Grade 6 and above
Texas Tommy Grade 5 and above
